CAPPY
=====

CAchingProxyinPython is a file based python proxy based on Sharebear's
`simple python caching
proxy <http://sharebear.co.uk/blog/2009/09/17/very-simple-python-caching-proxy/>`__.

Install
-------

``pip install cappy``

Usage
-----

``cappy run``

Options
~~~~~~~

``--port`` - optional (default: 3030)
